#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
#include<utility>
#include<cassert>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define REP(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define rep(i,n) REP(i,0,n)
int main(){
  int T;
  string S;
  int i, j, res;
  assert( cin >> T );
  assert( 1<=T&&T<=100 );
  while(T--){
    assert( cin >> S );
    assert( S.size() <= 200 );
    rep(i,S.size()) assert( ('a'<=S[i]&&S[i]<='z') || ('A'<=S[i]&&S[i]<='Z') );
    res = 0;
    while(S.size()){
      i = S.find(S[0], 1);
      if(i==string::npos)
         S = S.substr(1); /* the same character is not found */
      else
         S = S.substr(1,i-1) + S.substr(i+1); /* the same character is found */
      res++;
    }
    printf("%d\n",res);
  }
  return 0;
}
